title: Study finds meditation boosts immune system
description: Trusted and independent source of local, national and world news. In-depth analysis, business, sport, weather and more.
cleaned_text: The Midday ReportVIDEO: Study finds meditation boosts immune systemRos ChildsPosted Thu 19 Jul 2012 at 2:24amThursday 19 Jul 2012 at 2:24amThu 19 Jul 2012 at 2:24am, updated Thu 19 Jul 2012 at 3:56amThursday 19 Jul 2012 at 3:56amThu 19 Jul 2012 at 3:56am Sorry, this video is not yet available or has expiredShareCopy linkFacebookTwitterRoy Sionillo from the Australian School of Meditation outlines the positive effects experienced by people who practise yoga and meditation.More on:AustraliaMeditation and PrayerAlternative MedicineMedical ResearchStressVaccines and Immunity
